Events.Text: You have lost your debit card and before you could cancel it, somebody withdrew $300 at an ATM. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Surely it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
Hello. I am afraid I have have lost my debit card and before I could cancel it, somebody withdrew $300 at an ATM.
You are Jane Doe. Your account number is 84318931431, but you forgot your PIN. (You might need your mother's maiden name for the security questions: Sanchez.) [instruction 2 of 5]
Could I get your full name, please?
Jane Doe. MY account number is 84318931431
Right, and your PIN as well please.
I cant remember the pin for now.
Could you provide your date of birth, please?

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system
